about_the_game:
ChiJi Typing Adventure


Welcome to ChiJi Typing Adventure, a fun and educational typing game designed specifically for children. Here, kids can improve their typing speed and accuracy in both Chinese and English while enjoying the learning process and gaining a sense of achievement.

ChiJi Typing Adventure offers a variety of rich learning and gaming modes:

Chinese Typing Practice

Practice Chinese typing, from basic Pinyin input to quickly typing full texts, helping children become familiar with the Chinese keyboard layout and improve their typing proficiency.
(Supports Zhuyin, Cangjie, Simplified Cangjie, and any other Chinese input methods)
(Supports Zhuyin, Cangjie, Simplified Cangjie, and any other Chinese input methods)
(Supports Zhuyin, Cangjie, Simplified Cangjie, and any other Chinese input methods)

English Typing Practice

By typing English words and sentences, children can learn and get familiar with English vocabulary, enhancing their typing speed while combining learning and entertainment.

Idiom Dictionary

The game includes a rich idiom dictionary, allowing children to learn idioms during typing practice, understand their meanings and usages, and expand their vocabulary.

Idiom Learning

A specially designed idiom learning mode uses interactive and fun methods to help children master more idioms, making learning easy and enjoyable.

Mini-Games

In addition to typing practice, we have prepared various fun mini-games for children. These mini-games are regularly updated to keep the experience fresh and enjoyable, providing additional fun within the game.

Coin System

Earn Coins: Children can earn coin rewards based on their performance during Chinese and English typing practice and idiom learning. The faster and more accurate they type, the more coins they earn.
Spend Coins: Earned coins can be used to unlock and play various mini-games. This motivates children to practice typing diligently and enjoy playing games after achieving their learning goals.

Continuous Updates

ChiJi Typing Adventure will be continuously updated, regularly adding new mini-games and learning content, allowing children to keep progressing and growing in a fun and engaging environment.
